meanings.sent1: She had the pimpliest face in the entire class.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the students, hers was the pimpliest complexion.
meanings.sent3: Even with makeup, her pimpliest features still stood out.
meanings.sent4: Her skin looked like the pimpliest of all the fruits in the basket.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reflected back her pimpliest flaws.

meanings.sent1: His face was the pimpliest of them all.
meanings.sent2: Among his friends, he had the pimpliest skin.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he wore the pimpliest mask.
meanings.sent4: The moon's surface looked like the pimpliest of all celestial bodies.
meanings.sent5: The old painting showed the pimpliest details of the artist's brushstrokes.
